item.title: An Introduction to Python and R
item.description: When it comes to data science, there has been a debate between Python and R languages that I have recently learned about. Both Python and R are generally useful and helpful for coding. However, each has their own advantages and disadvantages. Python generally has a more simplified syntax (ex. has less braces and parentheses and is more popularly used among people. On the other hand, R is used more often by those in specifically in the field of biostats and offers more easily accessible packages.
